1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Leon,
You are very welcome! I see the appointment on my calendar and I look forward to speaking with you!
Have a great weekend! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Leon Jablow [mailto:leon.r.jablow@gmail.com] Sent: Thursday, January 05, 2012 6:43 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners Inquiry
Nicolette,
Thank you for your reply and your call. Unfortunately, I was unable to take your call earlier today.
I have set up an appointment electronically through your online scheduling tool (Tues, Jan 10 at 1:00 pm EST)
I look forward to speaking with you. Happy New Year!
Best Regards, Leon -- Leon R. Jablow IV 757-506-4340 leon.r.jablow@gmail.com On Thu, Jan 5, 2012 at 4:05 PM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Dear Leon, As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the voicemail I left you. My name is Nicolette Taylor and I’ll be responsible for answering any questions you may have and providing you an overview of our services. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you to chat using my online schedule.
You may also watch a short video about who we are on YouTube.
You may also look at some of the stories from indepdenents who use MBO Partners.
I look forward to speaking with you,
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
